in_favor: The cost of remittances has fallen significantly over the past decade.
Digitalization could accelerate further decreases in remittance costs.
Remittances are essential for the economic development of many countries.
against: The global average cost of sending $200 decreased from 7.42 per cent in 2016 to 6.18 per cent in 2023, still above the 3 per cent SDG target.
Despite substantial progress in both regions since 2011, remittance costs are still high in Oceania and sub-Saharan Africa.
